subject: Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Brendan Burke’s cellphone was beeping within minutes of the start of his wife’s marathon in San Diego. A text message arrived with her latest time as she crossed the six timing mats around the course.
snippet: Brendan Burke’s cellphone was beeping within minutes of the start of his wife’s marathon in San Diego. A text message arrived with her latest time as she crossed the six timing mats around the course.
